name: Beat Boxer (itch) (SuperBrego)
description:
Let the music guide your strikes!

Beat Box is a beat-em-up where your attacks are dictaded by the music beats.

Taking each music track's audio spectrum, Beat Box makes each one an action, such as punching, kicking and blocking in order to defend yourself from the waves of enemies.

Commands

  • WASD for movement.
  • ESC for Menu.

This project was created as an academic project for Unisinos' Computador Animation activity.

Credits: Thomas Souza, Pattie Xavier e Yo.
